page.title: 08HEALTH SERVICES
page.content: Eastham Health Clinic was opened on the 30th of November 1962.It is twenty-three years old.There are many different services. There is a chiropodist at the clinic.She treats verrucas on peoples' feet.She is at the clinic four days a week.She also tells you various foot exercises.There is also a speech therapist who helps children with speech problems. The dental department is for school-aged children and pregnant women.The dentist is Mr Shar. A baby clinic is held every Monday afternoon.They give advice to women who have children or who are going to have children.The women do exercises and learn how to care for their babies.
